entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
